title: littile known trick for people struggleing to shield or heal the right people during chaotic moments
body:
if you hover a teammates champions portrait and cast the ability it will automaticly cast on them. 

for example: im playing {{champion:98}} and my {{champion:67}}   gets ganked. i hover {{champion:67}} 's champion portrait and press R, im now on my way for the counter gank and ~~steal~~ secure that sexy double kill, tower and dragon

replies.body: Holy shit, something helpful in the gameplay boards? It's a christmas miracle!
I'm new but I've got this one figured out...   Play Sona and let auto target figure out who needs to be healed. :P
That's what I do also. I would prefer pressing the ability and then F2-F5 like an MMORPG but I'll take what I can get :)
